member.name: M:UsaPopulation.WebApi.Controllers.UsaPopulationController.GetPopulationsDiff(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: The population difference of two given states at all years or one specified year. Diff property is the result of state A population subtract state B population.

member.name: M:UsaPopulation.WebApi.Controllers.UsaPopulationController.GetBiggestOrSmallestPopulationState(UsaPopulation.Domain.Utils.SuperlativeSize)
member.summary: The state with either biggest or smallest population at latest year.

member.name: M:UsaPopulation.WebApi.Controllers.UsaPopulationController.GetPopulationProgression(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: The population progression of a state, in quantity and percent. Choose incremental steps to see each yearly change.
